title: 111_hr4393
content: Amends the National Institute of Standards and Technology Act to reduce the matching funds requirement for participants in the Hollings Manufacturing Extension Partnership Program from not less than 50 of the costs incurred for the first three years and an increasing share for each of the last three years to no more than 50 of the costs incurred by a participating Regional Center for the Transfer of Manufacturing Technology. Directs the Secretary of Commerce to establish criteria to determine a Center's cost share.
